ygData.subject: Re: Brian, WTF
ygData.msgSnippet: ... WHAT?! This is intentional??? To balance the power of the spells?? What the hell is that? When rangers cast druid heals, they don t cost twice the mana.
ygData.messageBody:
> This is intentional to balance the power of the spells.
>
> Brian

WHAT?! This is intentional??? To balance the "power" of the spells?? What
the hell is that? When rangers cast druid heals, they don't cost twice the
mana. When paladins cast cleric heals, they don't cast twice as much. Yet we
when we get necro lifetaps, you charge us DOUBLE. This makes no sense. I
have 1200hp, a 45hp lifetap is not amazing, then you go so far as to make it
cost MORE mana than it should! Yeah, bait and switch alright. At least be
consistent, for crying out loud. Why do SKs get the short end of the stick?
This is not about lifetaps anymore, this is about BEING FAIR. If you say
you're gonna do something, then DO IT without adding HIDDEN crap like this.
If this is what you call "helping the shadow knight class" then you can keep
it, I don't want your "help." What a crock...

Dravith
